Trade/Device Name(s): Clearview Exact II Influenza A & B Test
Clearview® Exact II Influenza A & B Test
Submitter Information: Alere Scarborough, Inc., d/b/a Binax, Inc.
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Clearview Exact II Influenza A & B Test, an immunochromatographic lateral flow assay for qualitative detection of influenza A and B antigens in nasal swabs.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of influenza A and B nucleoprotein antigens in nasal swab specimens from symptomatic patients to aid rapid differential diagnosis; negative results should be confirmed by cell culture and not used as sole basis for management.
